name: Clash of Magic VR
description: On the United Island of Magic, there is an Academy of Witchcraft and Wizardry. Students with magic powers, regardless of their ethnicity and background, can apply to this university. The acceptance rate is lower than Harvard.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1, or Windows 10 Processor: IntelÂ® i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350 equivalent or greater Memory: 8 MB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD RX470 or greater DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 2 GB available space
